name: Kurgo Dog Core Cooling Vest - Summer Cooling Jacket - Evaporative Cooling Coat - Harness-Compatible - Reflective Accents - Grey - Large
short_description: Stay Cool on Every Adventure: The Kurgo Dog Core Cooling Vest helps prevent overheating in warm weather using an evaporative cooling coat design and lightweight cooling gear construction
Functional & Comfortable Fit: Features adjustable side straps and quick release buckles for secure, customizable wear that’s perfect for running, hiking, or everyday outings
Smart Features for Hot Weather: This dog cooling vest includes a two way zippered top for easy harness access, plus heat reflective fabric and high-visibility trim for safety
Designed for Real-World Adventures: Kurgo gear is built to solve everyday challenges with dogs, making travel, walks, and outdoor play safer, easier, and more fun for both of you
Durable Gear, Lifetime Promise: Engineered for longevity and reliability, every Kurgo product is crafted with rugged materials and backed by our industry-leading lifetime warranty
product_description: Dogs can’t take off their fur coats—but with the Kurgo Dog Core Cooling Vest, they don't have to. Designed for hot summer days, this vest uses evaporative technology to help your pup stay cool and comfortable during outdoor adventures. Just soak the vest in cold water, wring it out, and strap it on. As the water evaporates, it draws heat from your dog’s body, making it a must-have for summer hikes, park days, and camping trips. The vest is made with lightweight polyester and lined with breathable air mesh, combining comfort with functionality. Its athletic cut offers a snug fit without restricting movement, and the light gray exterior helps reflect sunlight to reduce heat absorption. The design centers the cooling effect on your dog’s core—where it matters most—making it more efficient than standard dog shirts or jackets. Built for real-life usability, the vest includes a two-way zipper that gives you access to a collar or harness underneath. Adjustable side straps with quick-release buckles ensure a secure fit for dogs of various sizes, while reflective accents boost visibility during early morning runs or evening walks. When the cooling effect fades, simply rewet the vest to recharge it again. Whether you’re training on trails or relaxing at the lake, this cooling vest keeps your dog ready for whatever comes next. It’s durable, machine washable, and easy to pack—perfect for any adventure-ready pup. At Kurgo, we believe that life’s best moments happen when you and your dog explore the world together. That’s why every product we create is designed to make those adventures easier, safer, and more enjoyable. From trail-tested harnesses to travel-friendly accessories, our gear is made with high-quality materials and real-life usability in mind. Backed by a lifetime warranty, Kurgo products combine rugged durability with smart functionality—because your dog deserves gear that works as hard as they play. Let’s gear up and go together.

name: Dog Cooling Vest. Lightweight Jacket with Evaporative Cool Microfiber Technology, UV Protection Shirt for Beach, Sizing for Small, Medium and Large Dogs (L, Dark Blue)
short_description: INSTANTLY COOL YOUR DOG: Once you wet and then fit the dog cooling vest to your pup, the unique microfiber fabric will get to work. It absorbs and draws the excess heat out of your dog, so he doesn’t have to work as hard to pant to cool his body down.
SUN-SAFE DESIGN: The protective shirt covers your dog's back and chest, offering full protection from harmful UV rays. It keeps your dog safe in the summer sun and looks stylish too!

COMFORTABLE AND SAFE MATERIALS: Made from soft cooling microfiber porous fabric, this vest feels as comfortable as a soft t-shirt for your dog. It provides both cooling and protection while being lightweight, breathable, and non-irritant. You can also comfortably fit a dog harness over the vest for walking.

EASY TO USE AND MAINTAIN: Simply soak, wring out, and dress your dog for instant cooling relief. Available in sizes from XS to XL and adjustable for different shaped dogs, there’s a cooling shirt size to fit any pup, large or small. Plus, the vest is machine washable for easy care.

VERSATILE FOR ALL ACTIVITIES: Ideal for hiking, walking, beach trips, and any outdoor fun, keeping your dog cool and comfy. Just carry a bit of extra water to rewet the vest easily if it dries out, so your pup stays refreshed all day long.

name: Summer Dog Cooling Vest - Lightweight Dog Cooling Jacket, Breathable Shirt for Walking, Outdoor Hunting Training and Camping (S)
short_description: Summer Essential: Keep your dog cool and prevent heatstroke with this dog cooling vest, designed for effective heat relief during hot weather.

Three-Layer Cooling Fabric: Features a close-fitting cooling layer to prevent direct moisture contact, a high-density absorbent layer to lock in moisture, and a 3D breathable layer for continuous evaporation, ensuring your dog stays comfortable.
Utilizing ultra-lightweight fabric, this dog cooling vest remains exceptionally light even when wet, providing your dog with a prolonged cooling experience.
Easy Activation: Simply soak the dog cooling shirt in water, wring out excess, and put it on your dog. For a quick refresh, wet the vest while it's on your dog.
Adjustable Fit: Refer to the size chart and measure your dog's back length and weight to ensure the perfect fit.

name: SlowTon Dog Cooling Vest with Handle - Pocket for Ice Pack, UV Protection Breathable Cooling Shirt for Large Medium Small Dog, Adjustable Cooling Jacket for Outdoor Hiking Walking Summer (GY, S)
short_description: Quick Cooling --- The SlowTon cooling vest for dogs is made of 3 layers of material, which absorbs excess body heat through moisture evaporation, and helps pets stay cool outdoors on hot summer days. The outer layer can help evaporate and sun-proof, the middle layer absorbs and stores moisture and the inner layer transfers the cooling effect to your dog's body.

Easy to Use --- ①Soak the dog cooling jacket in water. ②Wring out the excess water of the cool clothes. ③Put ice pack into the pocket. ④Put it into the fridge and freeze for 10 minutes. ⑤Put it on your dog. Note: If the dog has an upset stomach, it is not recommended to use ice pack to avoid catching a cold.

Control Handle and D-ring --- The dog cooling shirt comes with soft handle on the top to provide better control for you, help to guide your dog. The back sturdy metal D-ring can distribute pulling pressure evenly to the whole body to prevent choking.

Detachable Pocket --- Our dog cooling vest is designed with a pocket at the dog back for storing ice pack. You can put the ice pack into the pocket to achieve an enhanced cooling effect and keep your dog cool during hot summer day. Enjoy maximum cooling comfort wherever your pet goes. The pocket of hook and loop design is easy to take and put the ice pack. It is detachable and can be removed for cleaning. ( Ice Pack is Not Included.)

Reflective Strips for Safety ---There are reflective strips on the collar and back of our cooling vest harness. Which can make your dog easier to notice by others during low-light conditions or night walk, to enhance safety and reduce potential risks.

Adjustable & Multiple Sizes --- The hidden buckles on both sides of the dog cooler make it easy to put on and take off. Adjustable buckles on the belly allow you to adjust it to fit your dog's body, keeping it snug and not easy to shift. Available in 6 sizes from XS to 2XXL to suit various breeds and sizes of dogs. Please measure your dog's chest and neck before ordering and choose from the corresponding size chart.
product_description: Looking for a way to keep your dog cool during hot weather? SlowTon dog cooling vest are perfect for active dogs who enjoy outdoor activities. With three layers of lightweight and breathable materials, the cool fabric quickly evaporates heat to regulate your pet's body temperature, keeping them comfortable at all times. Outstanding Features of SlowTon Cooling harness for dog: 1. Comfort Control Handle: There’s a soft handle on the top, you can grab it and keep control of dogs when they go crazy or when they need help. 2. Quick Cooling: Made of 3 layers of material, absorbs excess body heat through moisture evaporation to keep pets cool and comfortable. 3. Easy to Use: Simple 5-step process to use the vest, soak, wring, insert ice packs, freeze, and put on your dog. 4. Detachable Pocket: Enhanced cooling effect with a detachable pocket for ice pack that can hold ice packs securely with magic tape opening. Specifications: Size XS: Neck Girth 13.8", Chest Girth 12.6-18.5" Size S: Neck Girth 15 ", Chest Girth 16.1-21.7” Size M: Neck Girth 17.3 ", Chest Girth 19.7-26.8” Size L: Neck Girth 20.1", Chest Girth 24.4-31.1” Size XL: Neck Girth 22", Chest Girth 29.9-36.6” Size 2XL: Neck Girth 25.6 ", Chest Girth 33.9-42.5” Color: Grey Package include: 1 x Dog Cooling Vest

SAFE AND COMFORTABLE: Our Dog Cooling Vest features a convenient D-buckle design that eliminates the need for an additional leash and allows your dog to move freely outdoors. This undershirt also comes with reflective strips to increase your dog's visibility and safety

CONVENIENT DESIGN: Our undershirt has adjustable buckle chest straps at the entrance neck and chest as well as the back to ensure a snug and comfortable fit without restricting your dog's mobility or agility

HOW TO USE: Simply soak the cooling undershirt in cold water, wring it out and put it on your dog. As the vest gradually evaporates, it lowers your dog's body temperature and provides a soothing cooling effect. By using this cooling vest, you can greatly reduce your dog's risk of elevated temperatures and heat-related problems

SIZE SELECTION: Our dog cooling undershirts are available in sizes ranging from S to 2XL. Before ordering, please measure your dog's chest and neck accurately, pay attention to the length of the back, then refer to our size chart to choose the right size for your furry companion

name: Dog Cooling Vest, Lightweight Cooling Vest for Small Dogs (44-66lbs), Adjustable and Comfortable Cooling Jacket - UV Protection Breathable Mesh (Blue, XL)
short_description: Quickly Cool Your Pet - The comfpet pet cooling vest is inspired by human sweating and is made from a three-layer cooling fabric that is soaked in water and wrung out to cool your dog, it will absorb excess heat from your dog's body and dissipate it through evaporation for quick cooling. No chemical coolants are used.

Ideal for Large Dogs (55-88 lbs) - Designed for large breeds such as Golden Retrievers, Labradors, Huskies, German Shepherds and more. Fit Criteria: Should fit snugly but not tightly, allowing fingers to slide easily under the fabric. Avoid blocking leg movement or rubbing underarms.

Used It Anywhere - Whether it's outdoors in the heat, on the beach in the sun, or even at home without air conditioning, the dog cooling jacket is your best bet. Simply soak it in water and the cooling vest can be used countless times to keep your dog cool indefinitely! No chemical cooling agents are used.

Lightweight & Breathable Fabric - This cooling vest for dogs has a polymer resin inner layer that absorbs excess heat from your dog's body and an absorbent cotton middle layer that wicks away water to keep your dog cooler for longer. The outer layer is a mesh fabric that increases the area of contact between the fabric and the air for cooler temperatures.

Eye-Catching Color - When playing outdoors with your dog, you want them to be free to play, but you may be worried about them getting lost. The fluorescent yellow look of the pet vest improves visibility and helps you find your dog quickly, so you can rest assured that your dog is safe and free to play.

Very Easy To Put On - Simply pull the dog cooling vest over your dog's head and adjust the chest buckle to complete the fit and it won't slip off easily. Please measure your dog's chest and neck according to the size chart before ordering to ensure the most comfortable cooling for your dog.

name: Dog Cooling Vest – Lightweight Pet Cooling Shirt 3D Breathable Mesh, Reflective Strips & UV Protection for Walking, Hiking, Park – Adjustable Fit Dog Cooler Jacket with D-Ring U-DCV04S
short_description: INSTANT COOLING RELIEF - Our dog cooling vest with advanced 3D breathable mesh fabric promotes rapid evaporative cooling, instantly lowering your dog's body temperature. The lightweight microfiber construction efficiently draws excess heat from body through evaporative cooling, keeping them comfortable even in hot weather.

QUICK & EASY TO USE - Simply soak the Dog Cooling Shirt in water for 2-3 minutes, gently wring out excess water, and put it on your dog. For enhanced cooling effect, refrigerate the damp vest for 10 minutes before use.

SAFETY & PROTECTION FEATURES - Features reflective strips for nighttime visibility and UV protection material to shield against sun rays. The durable D-ring allows secure leash attachment, while the breathable design prevents overheating during outdoor activities.

PERFECT ADJUSTABLE FIT - The hook-and-loop adjustable chest straps on this dog cooling jacket ensure a customized, secure fit for dogs of various sizes. Designed for all-day comfort during walking, hiking, park visits, or beach outings.

SIZING GUIDE & CARE - Please measure your dog's chest girth (the widest part behind front legs) for accurate sizing. Different breeds may require different sizes regardless of weight. Machine washable for easy care - simply air dry after use.
